title: Mecha Malphite W not instant cast like classic
body:
I just tested both skins in a custom game.
Classic Malphite has no cast time on W, so it is instant and does not prevent auto attacks.
Mecha Malphite has an animation for W and the animation is uninterruptible and adds a 1 to 2 second cast time which prevents autos from going off during the cast.

replies.body: I've been using Ironside Malphite and it has the same issue. I've been using it for so long that I forgot it was different in the classic skin and it feels really clunky. Please fix this

Hey! 

I did some testing around it myself. I'm no Malphite main, but from what I saw, it looks like its more of an optical illusion because he raises his arms. From what I can see initially, Malphite continues his auto attacks while the Brutal Strikes (W) animation plays. Same case for Ironside Malphite, as OnlyBourger14 had mentioned below. 

If you have a video, I'd be happy to take a look and look into it further. :)
